channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MN

item.title: Report X-2023101116
item.description:
Report X-2023101116

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-12
  • City: SAINT PAUL
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE FOUND INSIDE TRAILER WET SOILED/STAINED ON SIDES AND TOP OF BOX. DescribePack: CAP ON GLASS 4 LITER BOTTLE CAME LOOSE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: LEAKED ALMOST ALL OF THE LIQUID OUT.

item.title: Report X-2023100648
item.description:
Report X-2023100648

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-14T18:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-03
  • City: ROGERS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at station with noticeable leaking contents from package's lid. Immediately placed package into plastic lined tote and added to drain mats in damaged hazmat processing area. DescribePack: Loose lid caused leaking DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Immediately placed package into plastic lined tote and added to drain mats in damaged hazmat processing area.
